title: Lissandra Ulti 1.5 Second stun and Garen ult still casts?

replies.body: did you stun him as he casted it? also, what is tenacity.

He began animation then was stunned and called down his mighty sword while he was stunned with his arms in the air and I died then about .65 seconds later he was unstunned and continued on his merry way. He had no Tenacity. (Possibly Masteries but it was during first half second of stun that his ult cast through the stun).
It's not a channel ability. Once it's activated, it's activated and no amount of CC will stop it. Basically you were a tad too late to stop his ult.
Not true. A suppress would have stopped it
That's nothing, I got hit by Darius slam from like 20 meters away after a flash. It's like he threw a tantrum, hit the ground, and the sheer force killed me, or some crap.
Lol. I got grabbed after a flash other day and dragged like 600m back into fight then slam dunked. Riot pls fix these hacks lol.
I agree, hard CC should interrupt abilities with cast times.
Garens ult has a cast time, it's the same thing in which Cassiopea can ult while ulted by Malzahar if its timed right.
Stunned Garen and his ulti still cast while he was stunned.
your solution. get out of its line of sight or suppress him.
